data.actual_result: it says "1 members" underneath the group name
data.expected_result: It should say "1 member" underneath the group name
data.short_description: Groups with only one person in them say "1 members" instead of "1 member"
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a way to get into a group by yourself (I dm'ed a webhook, but you can also make a group dm with other people then kick them) - Go to your Direct Messages list - Observe the number of people in the group
